desc: Glenda's Christmas Cottage is a Boutique Christmas Store that specializes in everything Christmas. From Decorations, Decor, Ornaments in every shape, size, style and colour to one of a kind collectibles like Jim Shore, Byers Choice Carollers, Dickens Village pieces, Snowpinions, Snowbabies, and Possible Dreams Santas.

layout.text: A CHRISTMAS BOUTIQUE IN THE COUNTRY.
